sentences: Kaoru Kakudo (1947 â€“ April 15, 2004) was a violinist, born in Japan, who performed internationally in recital and solo orchestral appearances.
She was a concertmaster of the Rotterdam Philharmonic Orchestra in the Netherlands.

After winning a competition for young musicians and her debut on television, she was admitted to the Tokyo National University of Fine Arts and Music where she studied with Tatsuo Uzuka and Takaoki Ono, before concluding her musical education with Ivan Galamian in New York.
